short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quickly submit referrals to your partners.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Euler transforms your email inbox into a powerful referral hub, enabling seamless submission of partner leads without ever leaving your message view. Designed for efficiency and convenience, this tool empowers you to quickly create referrals directly from your partners' emails, streamlining your workflow and maximizing productivity. With Euler, managing referrals becomes an effortlessly integrated part of your daily email routine, ensuring you never miss an opportunity to expand your network.
